metadata.title: CVE-2024-26668 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_limit: reject configurations that cause integer overflowReject bogus configs where internal token counter wraps around. This onlyoccurs with very very large requests, such as 17gbyte/s. Its better toreject this rather than having incorrect ratelimit.
